response.original_title: All the Ways I Loved Her
response.overview: When seventeen-year-old Mara Ellis returns to her family’s beach town for one last summer before college, she doesn’t expect to fall in love—twice. Caught between Liam, her childhood best friend who’s always been there, and Sienna, the fearless new girl who sees her in a way no one else ever has, Mara finds herself torn between comfort and curiosity, safety and freedom. As summer fades, she must decide not just who she loves—but who she wants to become.
response.tagline: How many ways can you love someone?
response.title: All the Ways I Loved Her
